languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, эта женщина, очевидно, больна духовно и физически. Лучше нам оставить ее в покое".
"Lord Captain, this woman is clearly ill in both spirit and body. Best to leave her be."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, эта женщина, очевидно, больна духовно и физически. Лучше нам оставить ее в покое".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, this woman is clearly ill in both spirit and body. We ought to leave her alone."
"Lord Captain, this woman is clearly ill in both spirit and body. We ought to leave her alone."
"Lord Captain, this woman is clearly ill in both spirit and body. Best to leave her be."
"Lord Captain, this woman is clearly ill in both spirit and body. Best to leave her be."
"Lord Captain, this woman is clearly ill in both spirit and body. Best to leave her be."
"Lord Captain, this woman is clearly ill in both spirit and body. Best to leave her be."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, es evidente que esta mujer está enferma en cuerpo y alma. Es mejor dejarla estar».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this woman is clearly ill in both spirit and body. Best to leave her be."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, es evidente que esta mujer está enferma en cuerpo y alma. Es mejor dejarla estar».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、この女性は明らかに心身ともに病んでいます。そっとしておくのが一番です」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this woman is clearly ill in both spirit and body. Best to leave her be."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、この女性は明らかに心身ともに病んでいます。そっとしておくのが一番です」

languages.text: “舰长大人，这个女人的精神与肉体显然已经病了，还是不要管她了吧。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this woman is clearly ill in both spirit and body. Best to leave her be."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，这个女人的精神与肉体显然已经病了，还是不要管她了吧。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, diese Frau ist eindeutig krank in Geist und Körper. Befasst Euch besser nicht mit ihr."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this woman is clearly ill in both spirit and body. Best to leave her be."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, diese Frau ist eindeutig krank in Geist und Körper. Befasst Euch besser nicht mit ihr."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, en plus d'être dans un piteux état, cette femme n'a manifestement plus toute sa tête. Nous devrions la laisser en paix. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this woman is clearly ill in both spirit and body. Best to leave her be."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, en plus d'être dans un piteux état, cette femme n'a manifestement plus toute sa tête. Nous devrions la laisser en paix. »

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, bu kadının hem ruhen hem de bedenen hasta olduğu aşikâr. Onu kendine hâline bırakmak, en iyisi olacaktır."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, this woman is clearly ill in both spirit and body. Best to leave her be."
